pinyin: kuai4 su4 yi3 tai4 wang3 luo4

sentences.english: Immediate turn right 90 degrees, fast moving target at 12 o'clock.
sentences.chinese: 立即右转90度快速移动目标在正前方。

sentences.english: The Rapid Displacement Heating (RDH) cooking process has been developed by Beloit Corporation as an energy efficient pulping system.
sentences.chinese: 阐述了快速置换加热间歇蒸煮化学和技术的原理。

sentences.english: The strongest , fastest winds of a hurricane are found in the eyewall.
sentences.chinese: 最强劲最快速的风在飓风的眼壁中。

sentences.english: Then consider how Pakistan is rapidly expanding its arsenal of nuclear weapons.
sentences.chinese: 再想想巴基斯坦是如何快速扩张它的核武器兵工厂的。

sentences.english: Nucleon density Instrument can test its compactness rapidly.
sentences.chinese: 核子密度仪可快速获得其压实度。

sentences.english: their relatively small scale makes it easier, and far faster, for them to adopt green frameworks.
sentences.chinese: 相对较小的规模使生态城采用绿色架构更容易更快速。

sentences.english: The economic development that the bank helped spur has unleashed a wave of environmental woes.
sentences.chinese: 亚银协助亚洲经济快速发展，引爆一波环保灾难。

sentences.english: The young Charlton's greatest strengths were his speed and body swerve.
sentences.chinese: 年轻时查尔顿的看家本领是快速的奔跑和身体变向。

sentences.english: An accurate description will help the Customs Authority of the country of destination to clear the products quickly.
sentences.chinese: 准确的货物名称有助于进口国海关快速清关。

sentences.english: This kind of fast, bloody raid is something the Reapers really excel at.
sentences.chinese: 这样的快速机动使得“收割者”非常擅长搜索。

sentences.english: The flexible dolly bar can effectively adjust the film space, and perform the accurate orientation.
sentences.chinese: 灵活的调节杆，能快速有效地调整膜距，正确定位。

sentences.english: Machine-assisted translation might be able provide on-the-fly translations for rapidly changing contents.
sentences.chinese: 计算机辅助翻译可以为快速变化的内容提供快速翻译。

sentences.english: Machine-assisted translation might be able provide on-the-fly translations for rapidly changing contents.
sentences.chinese: 计算机辅助翻译可以为快速变化的内容提供快速翻译。

sentences.english: Chris Hughton will be offered the opportunity to make a quick return to management with Sheffield United.
sentences.chinese: 谢非联为胡顿提供了一个快速上位的教练位子。

sentences.english: If you are in a hurry, we have a two-hour quick service.
sentences.chinese: 如果您急着要，我们有两小时的快速服务。

definition: to catch up with/to keep pace with
to take advantage/to seize an opportunity/in passing/without taking extra trouble/conveniently
